Message.Title: IBM CEO
Message.Msg: In a last ditch effort to give the appearance of running a Tight Profitable Ship she Tells Employees to Act Faster. What the Hell does that even mean.Also being that 95% of large corporations have downsized their work force by as much as 60% leaving remaining employees to do twice the work for the same pay. So Perhaps the CEO should Act Faster in her Quest to keep this Dinosaur Profitable. Naaahhh it`s far easier to pass the buck and blame it on the Employees.

Topic.Title: IBM CEO is in panic mode yells st employees to move faster. LOL

Message.Msg: I was surprised by this, and it is not a good sign....

Please take more time and improve your offerings. Thanks,

Topic.Title: IBM CEO is in panic mode yells st employees to move faster. LOL

Topic.Title: when is NEXT round of layoffs ?

Message.Msg: No need to get emails from HR...just read the journal today.."The bad first-quarter results prompted a round of restructuring at the company. IBM said it would spend around $1 billion in the second quarter on layoffs"...
